Reviews.Title: “A good little hotel suited for seasoned travellers”

Reviews.Content: stayed peyris 8 nights trip paris july didnt look photos trip advisor hotel booking websites complaint fine fault issues cleanliness daily housekeeping efficient fault hey paris considering cheap rate breakfast included paid happy value money found staff especially front office helpful flexible arrived morning filled registration card left luggage luggage thinking kill half day ready afternoon gentleman checked told welcome breakfast breakfast nice surprise breakfast inclusion kick following morning breakfast paris trip paris cosy breakfast thanks staff kindness attentiveness food selection buffet wasnt extensive satisfied nice croissants coffee offer day location hotel 510 minutes grands boulevards metro station paris north station thalys train day louvre museum walk 2025 minutes 1520 minutes foot galeries lafayette hotel stay door lopera middle les halles hotel peyris opera provide ideal location welltravelled holidaymakers highly recommend hotel base whilst paris

Reviews.Title: “Great Little Hotel.”
Reviews.Author: noelglee
Reviews.Content: wife stayed hotel peyris 12 days yes 12 sept 22nd oct 4th 2011 found staff friendly helpful breakfast fine nice french salon available guests past reception location boulevard bonne nouvelle lively ten minute walk grands boulevards metro access rest paris note tickets available bonne nouvelle metro recommend hotel peyris
